name: Kids Airport Adventure
description:
Children's games have been replenished with yet another fascinating novelty. We present to your attention a new entertaining game - "Kids Airport Adventure".
 
It's no secret that all children and adults like to rest, and the best holiday is traveling around the world. Here and now several families of funny animals met at the airport to board a plane and go to one of the twelve most interesting countries in the world, where they are waiting for a wonderful adventure.
 
While the merry animals are waiting for their flight, they have time to get to know more closely how the airport really works.
 
After our amusing passengers have chosen airlines and the country for recreation, they still need to do a lot of important things - buy plane tickets and get a visa to the country where they want to relax. To safely travel and hand over your luggage - it will be necessary to check the suitcases on a special device and hand over items prohibited for transportation. Only after that each member of the family will be able to put his suitcase on the conveyance belt.
 
After buying tickets and sorting luggage, the kids will need to help the pilots to sort out the airplane and its interior, clean them of dirt, repair minor technical problems, and then go on to new exciting adventures.
 
Our games for children will help your children in the game form to learn to count, develop color perception, memory and logical thinking, fine motor skills and attentiveness. Also, kids learn the rules of carrying baggage and the rules of carrying hand luggage, namely - that you can not take on a plane.
 
"Kids Airport Adventure" - this is just one of our development games for children. We create with love and care applications and free games that are aimed at the all-round development of your kids, revealing their inner potential, and also help children and you are interested, fascinating, fun and happy to spend their free time, will give a wonderful mood.
 
We just need to download our completely free games and go on a long-awaited journey for new adventures.
